label: invoiceApplicableCurrencyExchange
comment: A currency exchange applicable to the invoice for this supply chain consignment.
The currency exchange applicable to the invoice in this header trade settlement.

rangeIncludes.comment: The conversion of one currency to another.

domainIncludes.comment: A separately identifiable collection of goods items to be transported or available to be transported from one consignor to one consignee via one or more modes of transport where each consignment is the subject of one single transport contract.
The information, at a header level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction, with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, such as a commercial invoice.
